oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ACCURATE VALUES OF POLARIZABILITIES FROM HIGH-ANGULAR-MOMENTUM RYDBERG STATES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: energy-levels
ar-i
spectrum
polarization
cesium
nf
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have analysed Rydberg energies within a perturbative approach. Taking a suitable combination of states allows us to analyse cores with incomplete shells at the same level of accuracy as cores with complete shells. Using experimental values for the Rydberg energies of states with l greater-than-or-equal-to 3, we have deduced accurate values of dipolar and quadrupolar polarizabilities, and in some cases octupolar polarizabilities as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF PHYSICS B-ATOMIC MOLECULAR AND OPTICAL PHYSICS, 27(3), 601-614
